--- editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # CPC Initiative {#care-cpc} The __Comprehensive Primary Care (CPC) Initiative - Participating Primary Care Practices__ dataset provides a list of practices involved in a multi-payer initiative which fosters collaboration between public and private health care payers to strengthen primary care. ## Metadata ::: {.cell} 
       [ROWS] 497 
   [MODIFIED] 2025-04-24 
[PERIODICITY] Annually [R/P1Y] 
   [TEMPORAL] 2017-01-01 • 2017-12-31 
 [DICTIONARY] https://data.cms.gov/resources/cpc-initiative-participating-primary-care-practices-data-dictionary 
       [SITE] https://data.cms.gov/cms-innovation-center-programs/accountable-care-models/cpc-initiative-participating-primary-care-practices 
 [REFERENCES] https://data.cms.gov/resources/cpc-initiative-participating-primary-care-practices-methodology 
  [RESOURCES] https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset-resources/24da2642-7269-4c75-9a62-0dc3a195b205 
   [DOWNLOAD] https://data.cms.gov/sites/default/files/2020-07/CPC_Initiative__Participating_Primary_Care_Practices.csv
::: ### Resources ::: {.cell} 
[CSV] … CPC Initiative - Participating Primary Care Practices (98.8K)
[PDF] … CPC Initiative - Participating Primary Care Practices Methodology (72.3K)
[PDF] … CPC Initiative - Participating Primary Care Practices Data Dictionary (46.6K)
::: ### Dictionary ::: {.cell} 
# A tibble: 8 × 2
  field                           description                                   
                                                                      
1 Name of Initiative              Name of the initiative.                       
2 Participating Practice          Participating practice's name.                
3 Participating Practice Location Participating practice's location, including …
4 State                           State where the participating practice is loc…
5 City                            City where the participating practice is loca…
6 Geographic Reach                Geographic reach of the participating practic…
7 Street Address                  Street where the participating practice is lo…
8 Zip Code                        Zip code of the participating practice. This …
::: ## Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} quick("cpc_primary", limit = 5000) |> slt( practice = "Participating Practice", location = "Participating Practice Location", state = "State", city = "City", address = "Street Address" ) |> mtt( location = unlist( stri_extract_all_regex(location, "(?<=\\().*(?=\\))"), use.names = FALSE ), lat = stri_extract(location, regex = ".*(?=\\,)") |> as.double(), lon = stri_extract(location, regex = "(?<=\\,\\s).*") |> as.double(), location = NULL ) ```
